generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, flanked by parked cars and sidewalks.
- sidewalk: The sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, where a pedestrian is standing, and along the left side where parked cars are adjacent to it.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including multi-story structures with windows and commercial storefronts.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible along the street, providing shade and lining the sidewalks.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing bright and clear.
- person: A man is standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the image, holding a bag.
- car: Several cars are parked along both sides of the road, including sedans, SUVs, and a sports car.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible in the middle of the road, being ridden by a person.
- traffic sign: A circular "30" speed limit sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Traffic light poles and other poles are visible along the sidewalk and street.
- traffic light: A traffic light is mounted on a pole on the right side of the road.
